name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upwork Fellow - AI Proposal & Cover Letter Writer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open-source chrome extension that generates proposals using the OpenAI API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upwork Fellow is an open-source Chrome extension designed to help freelancers generate compelling proposals using the power of the OpenAI API. With just a few clicks, you can create professional and persuasive proposals tailored to your client's needs, increasing your chances of landing more projects. Perfect for freelancers on Upwork and other freelance platforms.

Key Features:
One-Click Proposal Generation: Instantly create professional and persuasive proposals tailored to your client's needs with just a single click.

Personalized Templates: Users can create and save personalized templates, ensuring each proposal reflects their unique style and expertise.

Custom Instructions to AI: Provide specific instructions to the AI to tailor the proposals according to your precise requirements.

No Data Saving: We prioritize your privacy; no data is saved on our end, ensuring your information remains confidential.

Open Source: As an open-source extension, Upwork Fellow is transparent and constantly improving through community contributions.

Elevate your freelancing game with Upwork Fellow, and transform the way you create proposals, making the process faster, easier, and more effective. 

Install now and start winning more projects with compelling proposals tailored specifically to your client's needs.

Github Repository: https://github.com/theharoonali/upwork-fellow-ai-proposal-generator
